name: Multipurpose Organisation for training, Health, education and Rehabitation
briefDescription: A not-for-profit NGO working in Karnataka. Since 1995 MOTHER is into community development activities through various interventions such as Integrated Watershed Development programs in 21800 Ha, women empowerment through 445 self help group and microfinance – LIVE FUND, Sustainable livelihood program for 4797 families, Organic farming village approach in 200 ha and Capacity building and skill development trainings in all the selected villages.Reached 505 villages with the support of JSYS funded (World Bank assisted) Tank rehabilitation program, Watershed Department’s (World Bank assisted) Watershed Development, NABARD funded Watershed, Tribal Development and SHG promotions, KSWDC’s (Worldbank assisted) Swashakti Project, UNICEF funded Swasthh Plus, BERI funded (UNDP Assisted) Biomass Energy for Rural India Project.
